summary.purpose: Defines and exports the VehicleSvg type, which is the standard function signature that all vehicle icon generator functions in this library must conform to.
summary.problem_solved: Establishes a shared contract for vehicle icon functions so that callers such as getVehiclesIcon and generateVehicleIconForMenu can invoke any vehicle icon interchangeably without knowing the concrete implementation.

exports.name: VehicleSvg
exports.description_one_line: Function type signature for all vehicle SVG icon generators, accepting size, colour, CSS class, and viewBox context parameters and returning a JSX element.

symbols.name: VehicleSvg
symbols.description_one_line: Function type signature for all vehicle SVG icon generators, accepting size, colour, CSS class, and viewBox context parameters and returning a JSX element.

details.what_it_does: Defines the standard callable contract that every vehicle icon function (redCarIcon, greenBusIcon, grayForkliftIcon, etc.) must satisfy. The five parameters cover dimensions (width, height), site-specific fill colour (siteColor), CSS class attribution (className), and a rendering context hint (viewBoxFor). Any function conforming to VehicleSvg can be stored in the allIcons map and invoked uniformly by getVehiclesIcon and generateVehicleIconForMenu.
details.type_definition: type VehicleSvg = (width: string | number, height: string | number, siteColor: string, className: string, viewBoxFor: string) => JSX.Element;

minimal_correct.title: Type a custom vehicle icon function

extensive_correct.title: Use VehicleSvg in a lookup map
